<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
<I>
	Goldcorp understands that conflicts of interest may arise in the ordinary course of
	business. Therefore, it is important to ensure that there is transparency and that all
	conflicts of interest and potential conflicts of interest are fully disclosed.
</I>
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<A NAME="X60364EXV99W4_HTM_117">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	What are Conflicts of Interest?
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Conflicts of interest occur when someone is asked to make a decision or perform a task on
	behalf of Goldcorp, but has a personal interest in the outcome of the decision (or even just
	appears to have an interest in the outcome of the decision). Personal interests in the
	outcome of a decision can be direct (for example, a financial benefit) or indirect (for
	example, a financial benefit to someone close to a person, such as a spouse, parent, child
	or other close relative).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Some common examples of conflicts of interest are:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	A person responsible for using or managing a Goldcorp asset (for example, money,
	supplies, equipment) is in a position to use the asset for their benefit or for the
	benefit of someone close to them.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P>
<HR NOSHADE>
<P>
<A NAME="eolPage282"></A>
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</H5>
<P>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN',TIMES,SERIF">
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<!-- FOLIO -->
	- 11 -
<!-- /FOLIO -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	A Goldcorp manager responsible for the performance of a Goldcorp function or
	operation is in a position to prepare or to alter or to direct others to prepare or to
	alter Goldcorp records to inaccurately describe the manager&#146;s or the operation&#146;s
	performance.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	A person responsible for awarding contracts on behalf of Goldcorp is in a position
	to choose between a company that offers the best quality, price and service and:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	a company that offers improper payments, loans, services, favours or other
	items of value to them or someone close to them;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	a company that is managed by them or someone close to them; and/or,
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	a company in which they or someone close to them owns a material interest or
	in which they or someone close to them will otherwise share in the success of.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	A person responsible for promotions or hiring is in a position to choose between
	someone close to them or better qualified candidates.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	A person who learns in the course of their work of business opportunities that would
	benefit Goldcorp is in a position to choose between pursuing the opportunity on
	Goldcorp&#146;s behalf or passing up the opportunity so that they or someone close to them
	can pursue the opportunity.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	A person investing or accepting outside employment or appointments that create
	conflicts of interest or appear to create conflicts of interest (for example, accepting
	part-time employment with a Goldcorp competitor, contractor, or supplier).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	A conflict of interest exists even if you believe it is possible to make a decision or
	perform a task without being influenced by personal interests.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<A NAME="X60364EXV99W4_HTM_118">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	How to Deal with Conflicts of Interest
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	In the event of a potential or actual conflict of interest:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Employees will always notify the Director, Risk and their Mine, Project, or Office
	Manager of the conflict in writing and not take any further action with respect to the
	matter until authorized to do so by the Director, Risk or the Manager. Notices
	addressed to the Director, Risk shall be sent to
<U>
	ethics.help@goldcorp.com
</U>
	or
	Goldcorp Inc., c/o Ethics Help, Suite&nbsp;3400-666 Burrard Street, Vancouver, British
	Columbia, Canada, V6C 2X8.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Directors and officers will always notify the Chairman of Goldcorp and the VP,
	Regulatory Affairs of the conflict in writing and not take any further action with
	respect to the matter until instructed to do so by the Chairman of Goldcorp or the VP,
	Regulatory Affairs. Notices to The Chairman shall be addressed to The Chairman and
	sent to
<U>
	ethics.help@goldcorp.com
</U>
	or Goldcorp Inc., c/o Ethics Help. Notices to
	the VP, Regulatory Affairs shall be addressed to the VP, Regulatory Affairs and sent to
<U>
	ethics.help@goldcorp.com
</U>
	or Goldcorp Inc., c/o Ethics Help, as applicable,
	Suite&nbsp;3400-666 Burrard Street, Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada, V6C 2X8.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<A NAME="X60364EXV99W4_HTM_119">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	Romantic/Intimate Relationships and Conflicts of Interest
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Goldcorp recognizes that romantic and intimate relationships between co-workers may arise
	and are private matters. However, these relationships can lead to actual or potential
	conflicts of interest or allegations of favouritism in the workplace. The following rules
	are designed to avoid conflicts of interest and allegations of favouritism associated with
	such relationships.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P>
<HR NOSHADE>
<P>
<A NAME="eolPage283"></A>
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</H5>
<P>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN',TIMES,SERIF">
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<!-- FOLIO -->
	- 12 -
<!-- /FOLIO -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	A supervisor who develops a romantic or intimate relationship with someone he or she
	directly or indirectly supervises must disclose and discuss the relationship with his
	or her immediate supervisor, or another supervisor, as appropriate in the
	circumstances.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	After learning of a relationship, such supervisor may adjust reporting or working
	relationships, including re-assigning supervisory responsibilities or transferring the
	persons involved to different positions or departments.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Goldcorp will always seek to resolve these matters as fairly and discreetly as
	possible to encourage full and timely reporting.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<A NAME="X60364EXV99W4_HTM_120">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	3.
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	Business Gifts, Entertainment Tickets and Meals
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
<I>
	Gifts, travel opportunities, tickets to sporting and entertainment events and meals can play
	an important role in building business relationships. However, depending on the size and
	type, they can also create the impression that someone is receiving special, unfair
	treatment. The following guidelines were created to make sure that we avoid those risks.
</I>
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<A NAME="X60364EXV99W4_HTM_121">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	Soliciting Gifts
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Employees, directors and officers will never ask for gifts, travel opportunities, tickets to
	sporting or entertainment events, or meals from Goldcorp&#146;s business contacts.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<A NAME="X60364EXV99W4_HTM_122">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	Accepting Gifts
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Directors, officers and employees will never accept any gift of cash or cash
	equivalent.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Directors, officers and employees may accept other unsolicited gifts, tickets, or
	meals if:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	they are infrequent;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	they are of nominal or reasonable value and do not constitute significant
	personal enrichment to the recipient;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	they are not out of the ordinary in our industry;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	they are appropriate (for example, sexually explicit gifts or entertainment
	are not appropriate); and
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	they help build or maintain good business relationships.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	If a director, officer, or employee receives gifts, tickets, or meal invitations
	that violate the Code, they must always disclose the situation to the Director, Risk by
	sending an email addressed to the Director, Risk at
<U>
	ethics.help@goldcorp.com
</U>
	who will direct the individual how to respond to the situation, which may be to return,
	to keep, or to give the gift to Goldcorp so that it can be donated to charity.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<A NAME="X60364EXV99W4_HTM_123">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	Offering Gifts (Government Officials)
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Goldcorp&#146;s policy of doing business with integrity means that neither Goldcorp nor its
	directors, officers, or employees will directly or indirectly give, offer or agree to give
	or offer a payment, a gift, or a benefit of any kind to a Government official for the
	purpose of influencing an official act or decision or related to retaining or obtaining
	business or directing business to any person. Such actions not only violate the Code, but
	also are illegal under the laws of the countries in which
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P>
<HR NOSHADE>
<P>
<A NAME="eolPage284"></A>
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</H5>
<P>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN',TIMES,SERIF">
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<!-- FOLIO -->
	- 13 -
<!-- /FOLIO -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Goldcorp operates. Other laws, including the
<B>
	Foreign Corrupt Practices Act
</B>
	of the United
	States of America and the
<B>
	Corruption of Foreign Public Officials Act
</B>
	of Canada make it
	illegal for a person to directly or indirectly give, offer or agree to give or offer a
	payment, a gift, or a benefit of any kind to a
<B>
<I>
	foreign official
</I>
</B>
	, a
<B>
<I>
	foreign political party
</I>
</B>
	or
<B>
<I>
	party official
</I>
</B>
	, or any
<B>
<I>
	candidate
</I>
</B>
	for foreign political office or to any person for the
	benefit of such a foreign person in order to obtain or retain an advantage in the course of
	business. The definitions of foreign officials and party officials apply to all such
	officials regardless of rank or position and can include families, members of royal
	families, and officials of state-owned businesses.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	These laws can be hard to understand and apply, but the penalties for failing to comply with
	the laws are serious and include prison terms, significant fines, and prohibition from
	participating in government contracting and other programs. Before making a gift, payment,
	or providing anything of value to a government official, whether domestic or foreign,
	directors, officers and employees will:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Always make sure they understand the laws that apply in the country where they work
	and make sure that they comply with these laws.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Always make sure they understand the laws of other countries that may apply to the
	situation and make sure that they comply with these laws.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Always seek advice from Goldcorp&#146;s General Counsel by sending an email to
<U>
	ethics.help@goldcorp.com
</U>
	or calling 604.699.0410 if they have any uncertainty
	regarding the application of the law to the action they are considering or how to
	comply with the applicable laws.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Always seek approval of Goldcorp&#146;s General Counsel by sending an email to
<U>
	ethics.help@goldcorp.com
</U>
	or calling 604.699.0410 before giving or offering to
	give any gifts or other benefit to any government official that is of more than nominal
	value.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Always properly account in Goldcorp&#146;s financial records for all payments made to or
	other benefits provided to any government official.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<A NAME="X60364EXV99W4_HTM_124">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	Offering Gifts (Non-Government Officials)
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Directors, officers and employees may give unsolicited gifts, tickets or meals to
	non-government officials if:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	they are infrequent;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	they are of nominal or reasonable value and do not constitute significant personal
	enrichment to the recipient;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	they are not out of the ordinary in our industry;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	they are appropriate (for example, sexually explicit gifts or entertainment are not
	appropriate); and
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	they help build or maintain good business relationships.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<A NAME="X60364EXV99W4_HTM_125">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(e)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	Keeping Records of Gifts
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Directors, officers and employees will always kept accurate records reflecting
	transactions with government officials sufficient to allow Goldcorp to maintain an
	adequate system of internal controls over such transactions in compliance with the
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P>
<HR NOSHADE>
<P>
<A NAME="eolPage285"></A>
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</H5>
<P>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN',TIMES,SERIF">
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<!-- FOLIO -->
	- 14 -
<!-- /FOLIO -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #TEXTCOLOR#; BACKGROUND: #BGCOLOR#">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	Foreign Corrupt Practices Act
</B>
	of the United States of America and the
<B>
	Corruption of
	Foreign Public Officials Act
</B>
	of Canada.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<A NAME="X60364EXV99W4_HTM_126">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	4.
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	Misuse of Undisclosed Material Information (Insider Trading and Tipping)
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
<I>
	Goldcorp requires its directors, officers, and employees to treat all information about
	Goldcorp in confidence and with care. Information that could reasonably be expected to
	affect the market price or value of Goldcorp&#146;s shares is considered to be &#147;material
	information.&#148; Securities laws ban using material information that has not been disclosed to
	the public when buying or selling shares (&#147;insider trading&#148;) and passing on this information
	to others for their use when buying or selling shares (&#147;tipping&#148;). Goldcorp has a policy
	with respect to insider trading and tipping.
</I>
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 18PT">
<B>
	To view the Disclosure Policy go to:
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<B>
	www.goldcorp.com/_resources/corporate_governance/timely_disclosure_insider_trading_policy.pdf
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<B>
	Printed copies of this Policy are available on Conveyor or from your site manager,
<BR>
	supervisor or head office
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Directors, officers and employees will:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Always maintain the confidentiality of all material undisclosed information
	about Goldcorp.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Never trade in Goldcorp securities when aware of material undisclosed
	information about the Company.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Always review the Disclosure Policy as required by this Code.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Always comply with the rules and procedures set out in the Disclosure,
	Confidentiality and Insider Trading Policy and all securities laws and regulations.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<A NAME="X60364EXV99W4_HTM_127">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	5.
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	Anti-Competitive Practices
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
<I>
	Goldcorp believes that fair competition is fundamental to our commitment to integrity and is
	committed to complying with the laws of all countries which prohibit restraints of trade,
	unfair practices or abuse of economic power.
</I>
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Directors, officers and employees will:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Never discuss commercially sensitive information (for example pricing,
	quantities, suppliers, delivery dates, production quotas, profit margins, cost
	structure, etc.) with Goldcorp&#146;s business partners or competitors or enter into any
	agreements (formal, informal or otherwise) regarding commercially sensitive information
	for the purpose of restraining free trade or competition.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Always leave any industry association or other events where our business
	partners or competitors are discussing topics that may be considered to be
	anti-competitive practices.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Always talk to the General Counsel (
<U>
	ethics.help@goldcorp.com
</U>
	or
	604.699.0410) about any questions or concerns relating to anti-competitive issues.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P>
<HR NOSHADE>
<P>
<A NAME="eolPage286"></A>
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</H5>
<P>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN',TIMES,SERIF">
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<!-- FOLIO -->
	- 15 -
<!-- /FOLIO -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<A NAME="X60364EXV99W4_HTM_128">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	6.
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	Money Laundering
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
<I>
	Goldcorp is committed to ensuring that its business operations are not used by others to
	bring funds generated by illegal activities into legitimate commerce (money laundering).
</I>
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Directors, officers, and employees will:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Always comply with laws regarding money laundering or knowing your customer.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Always take reasonable actions to ensure that new contractors and suppliers are
	legitimate business enterprises. Examples of indicators that a person or business may
	be engaged in illegal commercial activities include:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	refusing to give complete information or providing false
	information;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	setting up a transaction in a way that avoids complying with
	certain laws (for example, asking to submit several small bills instead of a
	single bill to avoid reporting payments to an authority);
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(iii)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	requesting that payments be sent to or advising that invoices
	will be sent by a person or company that you have never heard of instead of
	dealing directly with the contractor or supplier;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(iv)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	requesting that Goldcorp pay a bill indirectly by paying a
	person or a company that you have never heard of instead of paying the person
	or company that issued the bill or provided the services or goods to Goldcorp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(v)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	requesting or accepting payment in cash without proper
	supporting documentation; or
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(vi)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	any other unusual or suspicious payment or billing practice.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Always contact Goldcorp&#146;s General Counsel (
<U>
	ethics.help@goldcorp.com
</U>
	or
	604.699.0410) if you have any uncertainty about a particular agreement or transaction.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P>
<HR NOSHADE>
<P>
<A NAME="eolPage287"></A>
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</H5>
<P>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN',TIMES,SERIF">
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<!-- FOLIO -->
	- 16 -
<!-- /FOLIO -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<A NAME="X60364EXV99W4_HTM_129">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 12PT">
<B>
	PART 3 &#150; PROCEDURAL AND ADMINISTRATIVE MATTERS
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<B>
<I>
	Part&nbsp;3 of this Code sets out how to report suspected Code violations and how reported or
	suspected violations will be investigated.
</I>
</B>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<A NAME="X60364EXV99W4_HTM_130">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	A.
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	Procedures for Reporting Suspected Code Violations
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<A NAME="X60364EXV99W4_HTM_131">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	1.
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	Duty to Report Suspected Code Violations
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
<I>
	Employees, directors and officers have a duty to report suspected Code violations. They are
	also responsible for helping to identify and raise potential issues before they lead to Code
	violations
</I>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	All reports must be made in good faith.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	All reports received will be dealt with thoroughly and in good faith.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Reports should be made with as much specific information as possible and as
	soon as it is reasonably suspected that a Code violation may occur, will occur, or has
	occurred.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<A NAME="X60364EXV99W4_HTM_132">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	2.
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	Management Reporting of Suspected Code Violations
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
<I>
	Management will report suspected Code violations as provided in the following framework
	which is intended to ensure that suspected Code violations or situations that may create a
	potential for Code violations are reported to appropriate levels of management and the Audit
	Committee of the Board of Directors in a timely and effective manner.
</I>
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	All instances of Code violations or suspected Code violations must be reported
	in the
<B>
	quarterly
</B>
	disclosure letter to be provided by each region.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	In addition, situations that involve the following matters must be reported
<B>
	immediately
</B>
	to the Regional Vice President, Goldcorp&#146;s Director, Risk, VP, Regulatory
	Affairs, or General Counsel.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	a material misstatement or omission in Goldcorp&#146;s publicly
	released financial statements or any other matter that could reasonably be
	expected to result in a restatement of Goldcorp&#146;s publicly released financial
	statements;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	a material misrepresentation or omission in Goldcorp&#146;s other
	public disclosure documents other than financial statements;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(iii)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	bribery of a government official or other alleged violation of
	anticorruption laws;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(iv)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	known or suspected fraud that involves a potential cost or loss
	to Goldcorp exceeding US$10,000;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	In addition to the individuals identified above, situations involving the
	following matters must be reported
<B>
	immediately
</B>
	to Goldcorp&#146;s Chairman of the Board and
	the Chair of the Board&#146;s Audit Committee, or any other member of Goldcorp&#146;s Board of
	Directors.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	known or suspected fraud, regardless of amount, that involves
	an officer or director of Goldcorp or any of its subsidiaries;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P>
<HR NOSHADE>
<P>
<A NAME="eolPage288"></A>
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</H5>
<P>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN',TIMES,SERIF">
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<!-- FOLIO -->
	- 17 -
<!-- /FOLIO -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	known or suspected fraud, regardless of amount, that involves
	an employee who has a significant role in Goldcorp&#146;s internal controls;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(iii)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	an event or series of events indicative of a deterioration in
	the overall internal control environment at a Goldcorp mine site, project
	development site or office.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	If you are not sure if a matter falls into one of these categories, you must contact
	the Director, Risk VP, Regulatory Affairs, or General Counsel for clarification.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Directors, officers and employees who fail to report suspected Code violations
	or situations that may create a potential for Code violations will be subject to
	discipline, which may include termination of employment.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(e)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Directors, officers and employees who make reports for an improper purpose (for
	example, to get someone in trouble or to get someone&#146;s job) will be subject to
	discipline, which may include termination of employment.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<A NAME="X60364EXV99W4_HTM_133">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	3.
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	How to Report Suspected Code Violations
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
<I>
	Goldcorp promotes an open and positive work environment and encourages you to address any
	questions regarding the best course of action in a particular situation or concerns about a
	possible violation of a law, regulation or the Code promptly with your local management. If
	asking for guidance or reporting a concern to local management is not possible or for some
	reason you are not comfortable doing so or if local management does not resolve the matter,
	you should promptly contact Goldcorp as provided below or contact the Anonymous Compliance
	Hotline.
</I>
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Direct Reporting of Suspected Code Violations
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Suspected Code violations or situations that may create a potential for Code violations
	should be reported to Goldcorp at:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_118"></A>
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER">

</DIV>

</B>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Any supervisor, Mine Manager, Development Project Manager, Office Manager, Regional Legal
	Counsel, Chief Financial Officer, or Regional Controller who receives information related to
	a matter identified in Part&nbsp;3 A, Section 1(d) must report the information as required by
	those provisions of the Code.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->

<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Anonymous Compliance Hotline
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">

<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Reports of all types of suspected Code violations or situations that may create a potential
	for Code violations can be made on an
<B>
	anonymous
</B>
	and confidential basis to our independent
	service provider,
<B>
	The Network Inc.
</B>
	in English, Spanish or French by:
</TD>
</TR>

<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<A NAME="X60364EXV99W4_HTM_134">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	4.
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	Investigating Reports of Suspected Code Violations
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
<I>
	All suspected Code violations or situations that may create a potential for Code violations
	will be investigated and the findings reported according to the following protocol
</I>
</B>
<B>
	.
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	The Audit Committee Chair, VP, Regulatory Affairs, Director, Risk and the
	General Counsel, or any one of them, will decide who the most appropriate individual to
	manage an investigation.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Priority will be given to investigations into any matters listed in Part&nbsp;3A,
	Section&nbsp;1(e).
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	The individual responsible for an investigation may, at his or her discretion,
	request assistance or delegate responsibility for investigating to co-workers, legal
	advisors, accountants, or other advisors.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	To the extent possible, investigators will keep investigatory information and
	reports confidential, subject to the need to conduct a full and impartial
	investigation, to remedy Code violations, to comply with applicable law, and to monitor
	compliance.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<A NAME="X60364EXV99W4_HTM_135">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	5.
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	Cooperating with Investigations
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Directors, officers and employees have a duty to cooperate with investigations.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Directors, officers and employees who fail to cooperate with investigations
	will be subject to discipline, which may include termination of employment.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<A NAME="X60364EXV99W4_HTM_136">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	6.
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	Protection against Retaliation
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Goldcorp will not tolerate any form of retaliation (including termination,
	transfer, demotion, suspension, threats or harassment) against:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	people who in good faith report suspected Code violations or a
	situation that may create a potential for a Code violation; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P>
<HR NOSHADE>
<P>
<A NAME="eolPage290"></A>
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</H5>
<P>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN',TIMES,SERIF">
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<!-- FOLIO -->
	- 19 -
<!-- /FOLIO -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	people who cooperate with investigations of a suspected Code
	violation or a situation that may create a potential for a Code violation
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	based solely on the fact that the person acted as provided in (i)&nbsp;or (ii)&nbsp;above.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Directors, officers and employees who retaliate against any person identified
	in clause (a)&nbsp;will be subject to discipline, which may include termination of
	employment.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<A NAME="X60364EXV99W4_HTM_137">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	7.
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	Disciplinary Measures for Code Violations
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	When an investigator determines that the Code has been violated, the
	investigator may recommend to the appropriate manager that one or more of the following
	disciplinary actions be taken:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	require corrective actions to be taken (for example, sell shares or
	discontinue activities that create potential or actual conflicts of interest);
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	issue a warning letter or letter of reprimand;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	reduce or remove merit increase, bonus or other compensation;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	suspend the individual involved for a period of time (with or without pay);
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	demote the individual involved;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	terminate the employment of the individual involved; or
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="8%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	&#149;
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	if required or appropriate, refer the matter to government enforcement
	authorities for further action.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Directors, officers and employees who fail to comply with corrective actions
	will be subject to discipline, which may include termination of employment.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<A NAME="X60364EXV99W4_HTM_138">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	B.
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	Training and Awareness
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
<I>
	Goldcorp is committed to ensuring that all directors, officers, and employees are aware of
	and understand their responsibilities under the Code. To achieve this goal, Goldcorp will
	allocate resources to the following programs.
</I>
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV ALIGN="LEFT">
<A NAME="X60364EXV99W4_HTM_139">
</A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
	1.
</B>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
<B>
	Ethics Awareness and Verification
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Goldcorp will provide a copy of the current version of the Code and related
	policies to new directors, officers, and employees when they are hired and will provide
	copies of significant changes to the Code and related policies as necessary.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Goldcorp will require all directors, officers and employees to review the
	current version of the Code and related policies periodically, but no less frequently
	than once a year.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" NOWRAP ALIGN="LEFT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Goldcorp will require all directors, officers and employees to verify that they
	understand the Code and related policies when they start working at Goldcorp, when they
	receive copies of significant changes to the Code, and at periodic intervals.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>

</TD>

</TD>

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	and only with appropriate senior management or Board of Directors approval.
</I>
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 6PT">
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

</TD>

	All requests for an exemption from compliance with a requirement of the Code
	shall be directed to the Ethics Help at
<U>
	ethics.help@goldcorp.com
</U>
	, 604 699.0410 , or
	Goldcorp Inc. c/o Ethics Help, Suite&nbsp;3400-666 Burrard Street, Vancouver, British
	Columbia, Canada, V6C 2X8).
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>

	(b)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>

	or the Chair of the Audit Committee of the Board of Directors for approval, as
	appropriate.
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; COLOR: #000000; BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">
<TD WIDTH="4%" STYLE="BACKGROUND: TRANSPARENT">

</TD>

	(c)
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Where required by law, Goldcorp will publicly disclose exemptions from
	compliance with a requirement of the Code.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>

</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	Goldcorp will take adequate measures to make sure that all directors, officers,
	and employees are informed of significant changes to the Code.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	violations, investigation and disciplinary reports, will form part of the relevant
	individual&#146;s permanent employee records and will be retained by Goldcorp for not less than
	10&nbsp;years following the termination of the individual&#146;s employment by Goldcorp.
